name: CandyDish
0:
”Alexa, start Candy Dish”
”Alexa, open Candy Dish”
”Alexa, launch Candy Dish”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: candy dish
des:
Enter a new world, manage your Candy Brava dishwasher in an simple and intuitive way. You can find the best program to use, ask for advice, send commands or get technical support. 
To use the full features set of Candy Dish you must have purchased a Candy's dishwasher and have created an account using the Candy Simply-Fi App.
See the installation guide and the list of compatible models at http://bit.ly/candymodelsDW

About this skill:
The skill support the features as available in the Simply-Fi App. Whenever you want to interact via Alexa, you will have to use "Candy Dish" as an invocation name to activate the skill. Try saying "Alexa open Candy Dish ..." wait for the answer and ask the assistant a question, or say "Alexa ask Candy Dish .." and ask the question.

To get started:
Register your smart dishwasher using the Simply-Fi App on your iOS or Android device.
You can download the complete guide to make the association with Alexa and have the list of compatible models: http://go.candy-group.com/bm-dw

If you’re not familiar with the skill, simply start off by saying: 
“Alexa, ask Candy Dish to what can I ask you? or “Alexa, tell Candy Dish to know what can I do?”

You can do many things like:
Control the dishwasher remotely: you can quickly start a cycle and stop it at any time.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy Dish to start the Universal program" or "Alexa, open Candy Dish", wait for the answer and ask "how long till the end of the program?"


Discover the best program to use simply by saying the type of dishes that you want to wash.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy Dish how can I wash cups and teapots" or “Alexa, ask Candy Dish how can I wash pots and cups?”


Ask for advice on how to treat the most difficult stains.

Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy Dish how can I remove encrustation?" Or "Alexa, open Candy Dish" wait for the answer and ask "how do I remove the coffee stains?"

Know what a specific function or program is, or how you can take care of your dishwasher.
Ask Alexa: "Alexa, ask Candy Dish what the Eco Express option does?" Or "Alexa, ask Candy Dish What does the Universal cycle do?”, or "Alexa, open Candy Dish" wait for the answer and ask "When should the filter be cleaned?"

You can ask questions if you have doubts.
Ask Alexa: "Alexa, ask Candy Dish why is salt used in the dishwasher?”, or "Alexa ask Candy Dish what kind of crockery should I put in the upper basket?”;Or "Alexa ask Candy Dish what is error e03?"

Gimmicks
Try asking Candy for some strange questions, it will surprise you.
Ask "Alexa open Candy Dish" wait for the answer and ask "do you like being an assistant?" Or "Alexa ask Candy Dish if she wants to marry me"

Contacts
If you have any questions please contact Candy Support: support@candy-hoover.com
